Segment.name: BOL
Segment.comment: To transmit identifying numbers, dates, and other basic data related to the transaction set

Field.name: ShipmentMethodOfPayment1
Field.comment: Code identifying payment terms for transportation charges

Field.name: ShipmentIdentificationNumber
Field.comment: Identification number assigned to the shipment by the shipper that uniquely identifies the shipment from origin to ultimate destination and is not subject to modification; (Does not contain blanks or special characters)

Field.name: Date
Field.comment: Date expressed as CCYYMMDD where CC represents the first two digits of the calendar year

Field.name: Time
Field.comment: Time expressed in 24-hour clock time as follows: HHMM, or HHMMSS, or HHMMSSD, or HHMMSSDD, where H = hours (00-23), M = minutes (00-59), S = integer seconds (00-59) and DD = decimal seconds; decimal seconds are expressed as follows: D = tenths (0-9) and DD = hundredths (00-99)

Field.name: ReferenceIdentification
Field.comment: Reference information as defined for a particular Transaction Set or as specified by the Reference Identification Qualifier

Field.name: StatusReportRequestCode
Field.comment: Code used by the shipper to specify that an automatic status report is requested when the shipment is delivered

Field.name: SectionSevenCode
Field.comment: Code indicating applicability of section seven option (if not transmitted assume not in effect)

Field.name: CustomsDocumentationHandlingCode
Field.comment: Code defining method of handling for documentation

Field.name: ShipmentMethodOfPayment2
Field.comment: Code identifying payment terms for transportation charges

Field.name: CurrencyCode
Field.comment: Code (Standard ISO) for country in whose currency the charges are specified
